Objectives

By the end of this module you will be:

  • able to explain the functions of all the system controls on the flight deck
  • able to explain the meaning of all the System Panel Indications on the flight deck
  • familiar with the layout of the Electrical System
  • familiar with the Electrical System Synoptics
  • able to describe normal system operation in different phases of flight
  • familiar with the system redundancies in case of Abnormal or Emergency situations
  • familiar with required Handling and Servicing procedures
  • familiar with the required ready knowledge of the System Limitations
